comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Do you have any information on which intersection this looks north from? Nothing on it is identifiable to me. (I live downtown Toronto.)

comment.author: 26558978@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Brick Streets, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 19242763@N00
comment._content: If you look at the original print at the McCord Museum you can zoom in a bit more. One of the signs is for Dineens Furs. If you do a Google search for that store you can find an ad in the Jan 10th 1913 Toronto Sunday World newspaper saying it is located at 140 Yonge St Cor Temperence.

comment.author: 65849800@N02
comment._content: I can't even imagine taking the streetcar like this. Epic picture.
